title: New: Chantelle Paredes – Your Heart Will Beat You
content:
Given that I’ve lost half my hearing after a gig last night, this new track from California’s Chantelle Paredes is pretty much perfect listening right now.

Your Heart Will Beat You is a gorgeous, spectacularly considered slice of Zola Jesus / M83 dream-pop. Paredes’s angelic, soothing vocals float mystically over a tenderly played pipe organ, as the song builds to it’s layered crescendo. Check out Your Heart Will Beat You below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
